column3: > Seems to cause -Werror,-Wunreachable-code-loop-increment error https://cirrus-ci.com/task/5561194028204032?logs=ci#L2596\n\nAh I remember this is why I removed the loop initially. Quite funny that a compiler warning encourages you to introduce a bug.
Thanks for the unit test. Force pushed
cr ACK fa910b47656d0e69cccb1f31804f2b11aa45d053: patch looks correct
